blocks.name: ispsmet
blocks.content: Express the predicate " ` D ` is a pseudometric." (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Feb-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm ispsmet(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(cpsmet, c0)), wa(wf(c2, cxp(c0, c0), cxr), wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)), nat0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cpsmet, c0)), wa(wf(c2, cxp(c0, c0), cxr), wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)), nat0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))))))))), wa(wcel(c2, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(c0, c0))), wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)), nat0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))))))))))
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cpsmet, c0)), wa(wcel(c2, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(c0, c0))), wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)), nat0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))))))))), wcel(c2, crab(hs0, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(c0, c0)), wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), nat0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))))))))
  eleq2d(c2, cfv(cpsmet, c0), crab(hs0, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(c0, c0)), wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), nat0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cpsmet, c0), crab(hs0, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(c0, c0)), wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), nat0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs1, c0, universe, cpsmet, crab(hs0, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(c0, c0)), wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), nat0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))))), crab(hs0, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs1))), wral(s0, cv(hs1), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), nat0), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wral(s2, cv(hs1), wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))))))
  rabeqbidv(hs0, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs1))), co(cxr, cmap, cxp(c0, c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wral(s0, cv(hs1), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), nat0), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wral(s2, cv(hs1), wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))))), wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), nat0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))))))
  oveq2d(cxr, cmap, cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs1)), cxp(c0, c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  sqxpeqd(cv(hs1), c0, wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  id(wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  raleqbi1dv(s0, cv(hs1), c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), nat0), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wral(s2, cv(hs1), wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), nat0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), nat0), wral(s1, cv(hs1), wral(s2, cv(hs1), wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))))
  raleqbi1dv(s1, cv(hs1), c0, wral(s2, cv(hs1), wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1))))), wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))
  raleq(s2, cv(hs1), c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))
  df-psmet(hs1, hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  rabex(hs0, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(c0, c0)), wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), nat0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))))))
  ovex(cxr, cmap, cxp(c0, c0))
  elrab(hs0, c2, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(c0, c0)), wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), nat0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))))), wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)), nat0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)))))))))
  ralbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), nat0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)), nat0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), nat0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)), nat0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)))))))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), nat0, co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  oveq(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0), cv(s0))
  2ralbidv(s1, s2, c0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wbr(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)))))
  breq12d(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), co(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  oveq(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  oveq12d(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  oveq(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s2), cv(s0))
  oveq(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s2), cv(s1))
  anbi1d(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(c0, c0))), wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)), nat0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)))))))), wf(c2, cxp(c0, c0), cxr))
  sylancr(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(c0, c0))), wf(c2, cxp(c0, c0), cxr)), wcel(cxr, universe), wcel(cxp(c0, c0), universe))
  xrex()
  sqxpexg(c0, c1)
  elmapg(cxr, universe, cxp(c0, c0), universe, c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(crab(hs0, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(c0, c0)), wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), nat0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))))))
  diff.hs0.c(co(cxr, cmap, cxp(cv(hs1), cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs0.c(co(cxr, cmap, cxp(c0, c0)))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(s2)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s0)), nat0), wral(s1, c0, wral(s2, c0, wbr(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cle, co(co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), cxad, co(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)))))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

thm ispsmet(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c2 ‚àà(PsMet ` c0)‚Üî((c2 :(c0 √ó c0)‚Üí ‚Ñù*)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,((s0[c2]s0)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s0[c2]s1)[‚â§]((s2[c2]s0)[+](s2[c2]s1)))))))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà(PsMet ` c0), ((c2 :(c0 √ó c0)‚Üí ‚Ñù*)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,((s0[c2]s0)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s0[c2]s1)[‚â§]((s2[c2]s0)[+](s2[c2]s1))))))), (c2 ‚àà(‚Ñù*[‚Ü¶](c0 √ó c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,((s0[c2]s0)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s0[c2]s1)[‚â§]((s2[c2]s0)[+](s2[c2]s1))))))))
  syl6bb(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà(PsMet ` c0), (c2 ‚àà(‚Ñù*[‚Ü¶](c0 √ó c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,((s0[c2]s0)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s0[c2]s1)[‚â§]((s2[c2]s0)[+](s2[c2]s1))))))), c2 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà(‚Ñù*[‚Ü¶](c0 √ó c0))| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,((s0[hs0]s0)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s0[hs0]s1)[‚â§]((s2[hs0]s0)[+](s2[hs0]s1))))))})
  eleq2d(c2, (PsMet ` c0), { hs0 ‚àà(‚Ñù*[‚Ü¶](c0 √ó c0))| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,((s0[hs0]s0)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s0[hs0]s1)[‚â§]((s2[hs0]s0)[+](s2[hs0]s1))))))}, c0 ‚àà c1)
  syl(c0 ‚àà c1, (PsMet ` c0)= { hs0 ‚àà(‚Ñù*[‚Ü¶](c0 √ó c0))| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,((s0[hs0]s0)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s0[hs0]s1)[‚â§]((s2[hs0]s0)[+](s2[hs0]s1))))))}, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs1, c0, universe, cpsmet, { hs0 ‚àà(‚Ñù*[‚Ü¶](c0 √ó c0))| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,((s0[hs0]s0)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s0[hs0]s1)[‚â§]((s2[hs0]s0)[+](s2[hs0]s1))))))}, { hs0 ‚àà(‚Ñù*[‚Ü¶](hs1 √ó hs1))| ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà hs1,((s0[hs0]s0)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà hs1, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà hs1,(s0[hs0]s1)[‚â§]((s2[hs0]s0)[+](s2[hs0]s1))))))})
  rabeqbidv(hs0, (‚Ñù*[‚Ü¶](hs1 √ó hs1)), (‚Ñù*[‚Ü¶](c0 √ó c0)), hs1 = c0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà hs1,((s0[hs0]s0)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà hs1, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà hs1,(s0[hs0]s1)[‚â§]((s2[hs0]s0)[+](s2[hs0]s1)))))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,((s0[hs0]s0)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s0[hs0]s1)[‚â§]((s2[hs0]s0)[+](s2[hs0]s1)))))))
  oveq2d(cxr, cmap, (hs1 √ó hs1), (c0 √ó c0), hs1 = c0)
  sqxpeqd(hs1, c0, hs1 = c0)
  id(hs1 = c0)
  raleqbi1dv(s0, hs1, c0, ((s0[hs0]s0)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà hs1, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà hs1,(s0[hs0]s1)[‚â§]((s2[hs0]s0)[+](s2[hs0]s1))))), ((s0[hs0]s0)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s0[hs0]s1)[‚â§]((s2[hs0]s0)[+](s2[hs0]s1))))))
  anbi2d(hs1 = c0, (s0[hs0]s0)= 0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà hs1, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà hs1,(s0[hs0]s1)[‚â§]((s2[hs0]s0)[+](s2[hs0]s1)))), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s0[hs0]s1)[‚â§]((s2[hs0]s0)[+](s2[hs0]s1)))))
  raleqbi1dv(s1, hs1, c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà hs1,(s0[hs0]s1)[‚â§]((s2[hs0]s0)[+](s2[hs0]s1))), ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s0[hs0]s1)[‚â§]((s2[hs0]s0)[+](s2[hs0]s1))))
  raleq(s2, hs1, c0, (s0[hs0]s1)[‚â§]((s2[hs0]s0)[+](s2[hs0]s1)))
  df-psmet(hs1, hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  rabex(hs0, (‚Ñù*[‚Ü¶](c0 √ó c0)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,((s0[hs0]s0)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s0[hs0]s1)[‚â§]((s2[hs0]s0)[+](s2[hs0]s1)))))))
  ovex(cxr, cmap, (c0 √ó c0))
  elrab(hs0, c2, (‚Ñù*[‚Ü¶](c0 √ó c0)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,((s0[hs0]s0)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s0[hs0]s1)[‚â§]((s2[hs0]s0)[+](s2[hs0]s1)))))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,((s0[c2]s0)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s0[c2]s1)[‚â§]((s2[c2]s0)[+](s2[c2]s1)))))))
  ralbidv(s0, c0, hs0 = c2, ((s0[hs0]s0)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s0[hs0]s1)[‚â§]((s2[hs0]s0)[+](s2[hs0]s1))))), ((s0[c2]s0)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s0[c2]s1)[‚â§]((s2[c2]s0)[+](s2[c2]s1))))))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c2, (s0[hs0]s0)= 0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s0[hs0]s1)[‚â§]((s2[hs0]s0)[+](s2[hs0]s1)))), (s0[c2]s0)= 0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c0,(s0[c2]s1)[‚â§]((s2[c2]s0)[+](s2[c2]s1)))))

blocks.name: distspace
blocks.content: A set ` X ` together with a (distance) function ` D ` which is a pseudometric is a _distance space_ (according to E. Deza, M.M. Deza: "Dictionary of Distances", Elsevier, 2006), i.e. a (base) set ` X ` equipped with a _distance_ ` D ` , which is a mapping of two elements of the base set to the (extended) reals and which is nonnegative, symmetric and equal to 0 if the two elements are equal. (Contributed by AV, 15-Oct-2021.) (Revised by AV, 5-Jul-2022.)
